Title: WindowPhone Calendar Control
Description:
It is a simple windowsphone calendar control. 

I hope you like it.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
It is a windowsphone calendar control. 

when I made it (long time ago), I didn't find calendar control for windowsphone. So I made it. 

I use it in my app. My App: http://www.windowsphone.com/s?appid=96eb777b-d79d-45aa-beeb-2caaf93c289c

You can design the calendarItem style with expression blend.

The Calendar's HorizontalAlignment must be Stretch!

You can use it in your Apps.
 

Hope you like it :)
